CompRiskRE 0.0.1
  • Reference

    Package index

    Core Models

    Functions for fitting competing risks models with Relative Entropy integration.

    CompRiskRE_FT()
    Competing Risks with Relative Entropy Integration with a Composite Failure Time Prior Model
    CompRiskRE_CP()
    Competing Risks with Relative Entropy Integration with a Competing Risk Prior Model
    CompRiskRE_XGBoost_FT()
    Competing Risks with Relative Entropy Integration using XGBoost and Composite Failure Time Prior
    CompRiskRE_XGBoost_CP()
    Competing Risks with Relative Entropy Integration (Composite Prior, XGBoost)

    Simulation & Data Preparation

    Functions for simulating and reshaping.

    simulate_CPFT()
    Simulate external, local, validation, and test datasets
    prob_n()
    Simulate event times from a discrete competing risks model
    dataLong()
    Expand Survival Data into Long Format for Discrete-Time Models

    Utilities

    Helper functions for evaluation.

    CindexCR()
    Concordance Index for Competing Risk Models
    generate_eta()
    Generate a Sequence of Tuning Parameters (eta)
